description: Golden scam transcripts for testing and prompt tuning - Expanded to 50

messages.text: Dear customer, your SBI account has been blocked due to incomplete KYC. Update immediately to avoid permanent suspension.
Oh my god! Blocked? But I have my pension there! What do I do beta?
Don't worry sir. Just click this link and update your details: http://sbi-kyc-update.xyz
Link? Wait, let me get my reading glasses... My eyes are not so good these days.
You have won Rs 50,000 cashback! Send Rs 500 to claim. UPI: winner@okaxis
Hai Ram! 50,000? Really? But why I have to send money to get money?
It's processing fee sir. Very small amount only.
Processing fee... okay but my UPI is not working. Can you give your phone number? I will call.
This is HDFC Bank. We detected suspicious activity. Share OTP sent to your phone for verification.
Suspicious? Oh no! Let me check... I got some number on phone. Is OTP same as PIN?
No sir, OTP is the 6 digit code. Please share quickly before account is frozen.
Wait wait, internet is very slow... Let me restart my phone. One minute please.
This is cyber police. Your Aadhaar is linked to money laundering. Pay Rs 10,000 fine or face arrest.
Police? Arrest? But I am retired government servant! I never did anything wrong!
Sir this is very serious. Pay immediately to account 123456789012
Please beta, I am so scared. Can you come to my house? Where is your office? I will come there.
Congratulations! You are pre-approved for Rs 5 lakh loan at 0% interest. Apply now at instant-loan.in
0% interest? That is very good! But I don't need loan... My pension is enough.
Sir, this is limited offer. Just fill form and pay Rs 2000 processing.
Hmm let me think... Can I ask my son? He is in America, I will call him tonight.
URGENT: Your electricity connection will be disconnected in 2 hours. Pay dues immediately.
Disconnected? But I paid last month only! Let me find my receipt...
No time sir. Pay Rs 3500 to this UPI: electric-pay@ybl before cutoff.
Let me check the bill... Where did I keep it... Under the mattress maybe...
Amazon refund of Rs 15,000 pending. Install this app to receive: amazn-refund.apk
Amazon? I ordered something on Amazon? I don't remember... What did I buy?
Sir it's automatic refund for cancelled order. Just install and confirm.
Install means download? My phone has no space, it's always showing full...
Your LIC policy 987654 maturity of Rs 8 lakh ready. Pay Rs 8000 tax to claim.
LIC? I have LIC? Let me check my papers... My wife used to handle these things...
Sir, payment must be done today. Send to beneficiary@okicici
Today only? But banks are closed no? And I need to find my cheque book...
Your parcel stuck at customs with illegal items. Contact this number immediately: 9876543210
Parcel? Illegal? But I didn't order anything from outside! This must be mistake.
Your Aadhaar was misused. Pay Rs 25000 or police will come.
Oh god! Let me call my neighbor, he was in police. One minute please don't disconnect.
You won KBC lottery Rs 25 lakh! Transfer verification fee Rs 5000 to claim prize.
KBC? But I never called KBC! Amitabh Bachchan show?
Yes sir random selection. Your mobile won. Send to kbc-verify@paytm
Really? Let me tell everyone! Wait, can you talk to my son? He knows about these things.
Aapka account band ho jayega kal tak. KYC update karo abhi: sbi-kyc.tk
Kya? Band? Mera paisa! Mujhe kya karna hai beta?
Link pe click karo aur details bharo. Jaldi karo time kam hai.
Ruko ruko, meri beti ko bulata hoon, woh phone chalana jaanti hai...
Microsoft alert: Your computer has virus. Call 1800-XXXX immediately for free cleanup.
Virus? But I don't have computer, only this phone. Are you sure it's my number?
Sir your phone also affected. Download TeamViewer for remote fix.
TeamViewer? Is that a TV channel? I have Tata Sky only.
We have your private photos. Pay Rs 50000 or we send to all contacts.
Photos? What photos? I only have photos of my grandchildren. Which photos you mean?
Don't act innocent. Pay to bitcoin address or face shame.
Bitcoin? That is like Facebook? My grandson uses Facebook. He can help pay maybe.
Work from home job! Earn Rs 5000 daily. Just invest Rs 1000 to start.
Job? But I am retired! I don't need job now. I get pension every month.
Extra income sir! Pay registration to jobs@okaxis
Maybe for my grandson then. Let me ask him. What is the company name?
100% profit guarantee! Invest Rs 10000 get Rs 1 lakh in 7 days. Join Telegram: t.me/profitking
1 lakh? That is very good return! But my fixed deposit gives only 7%...
FD is old method sir. This is crypto trading. Guaranteed returns.
Crypto? Like cryptocurrency? My son said it's risky. Let me confirm with him first.
Your Flipkart order failed delivery. Confirm address and pay Rs 49 redelivery: flipkrt-pay.in
Flipkart? I think my daughter ordered something. Rs 49 is okay but which order?
Order ID 12345. Pay quickly or order cancelled.
Let me call my daughter and ask. She orders so many things...
Hi uncle! This is Rahul. I'm stuck, need Rs 20000 urgently. My phone broken, using friend's.
Rahul? Which Rahul? My nephew Rahul? Why you need money beta?
Hospital emergency uncle. Send to this number: 9876543210. Will return tomorrow.
Hospital? Are you okay? Let me call your mother first. What happened exactly?
Pension Adalat: Your arrears Rs 2.5 lakh approved. Pay processing Rs 5000 to receive.
Arrears approved? After so long? Which department is this from?
Central Government sir. Pay to pensionarrears@okhdfc before 5pm.
Central Government... Let me go to bank and ask. They will know about this no?
Your ATM card will be blocked due to RBI guidelines. Share card details to update.
Blocked? But I just withdrew money yesterday! The card is working fine.
New rule sir. All cards need update. Share 16 digit number and CVV.
16 digit? Let me find card... It's in my wallet... Where is my wallet...
HP Gas subsidy Rs 1800 pending. Share bank details for direct credit.
Gas subsidy? Good! But which account? I have SBI and HDFC both.
Share both account numbers and IFSC. We will credit to main account.
Main account means which one? Let me find my passbook and tell you.
Invest Rs 50,000 in Bitcoin today, get Rs 2 lakh in 15 days! Limited time offer from binance-india.tk
Bitcoin? I heard it in news. Is it safe? The government said something about it...
Completely legal sir. Many people earning lakhs daily. Send to cryptoking@okaxis to start.
2 lakh in 15 days? Let me discuss with my son-in-law. He works in IT company.
Hello dear! I am Lisa from USA. I sent you expensive gift but it's stuck at customs. Please pay Rs 15000 to release.
Lisa? I don't know any Lisa... Who are you? Why you are sending me gift?
We chatted on Facebook dear. I love you. Pay to lisa.miller@ybl. Call me: 8899112233
Facebook? But I don't use Facebook... My grandson makes the account but I never use.
2BHK flat available in Koramangala for Rs 8000/month only. Pay Rs 5000 advance to book. UPI: owner.kumar@okicici
Rs 8000 in Koramangala? That is very cheap! Where exactly is the flat?
Near Jyoti Nivas College. Many people interested. Pay now or you will lose. Call 7788990011
But I should see the flat first no? Can I come and see tomorrow?
EPFO Alert: Your PF refund of Rs 75,000 is pending. Click to claim or pay processing fee Rs 2000 to epfo.refund@ybl
PF refund? But I already got my PF when I retired. How is this pending?
Sir this is additional interest accumulated. Government new scheme.
New scheme? Let me ask at the PF office. I will go there tomorrow.
Paytm reward mil gaya aapko! Rs 10,000 cashback. Claim karo: reward@paytm pe ₹100 bhejo
Paytm reward? Maine toh kuch order nahi kiya. Kaise mila ye reward?
Random lucky draw sir. Aap lucky customer hain. Jaldi bhejo claim expire ho jayega.
Lucky draw? Hmm... mujhe apne bete ko call karna padega. Woh batayega sahi hai ya nahi.
Income Tax Dept: Refund of Rs 32,500 for FY 2024-25 approved. Pay Rs 1500 processing. UPI: incometax.refund@okhdfc
Income tax refund? But I filed through my CA. He never mentioned this...
This is direct from department sir. Call 9988776655 for verification.
Let me first call my CA tomorrow. He handles all my tax matters.
UIDAI Alert: Your Aadhaar will be deactivated in 24 hours. Update documents now. Pay Rs 500 to uidai.verify@ybl
Aadhaar deactivated? But I just used it for pension last month! It was working fine.
New verification required sir. Call 1800XXXXXX or pay immediately.
Hmm this sounds suspicious... I will go to Aadhaar center near my house and ask.
Your SIM will stop working tomorrow. Upgrade to 5G free. Share OTP to activate new SIM.
5G? What is 5G? My phone is working fine with whatever G it has...
Government mandate sir. All old SIMs being cancelled. Share OTP quickly.
Government mandate? Let me go to Jio store near bus stand. They will help me upgrade.
100% cure for diabetes! Ayurvedic medicine no side effects. Call 7766554433. Pay Rs 3000 for 1 month supply to ayush.medicine@okaxis
Diabetes cure? But my doctor said I have to take medicine lifelong...
Allopathy doesn't cure sir. Our natural remedy cured 10,000 patients.
Let me show this message to my doctor in next checkup. He will tell if it's good or not.
Traffic Challan: Rs 5000 fine pending against vehicle MH12XX1234. Pay immediately at echallan-parivahan.tk or to traffic.challan@ybl
Challan? But I don't even drive anymore! I sold my scooter 5 years ago!
Record shows pending sir. Pay now or license will be suspended.
I don't have license anymore... This is some mistake. I will go to RTO and ask.
SEBI registered advisor: Get 50% returns in mutual funds. Invest Rs 1 lakh today. Call 8877665544. UPI: invest.returns@okicici
50% returns? That is too good! My bank FD gives only 7%...
Bank FD is waste sir. Smart people invest in our funds. Guaranteed by SEBI.
SEBI guarantee? Let me check with my bank manager. He advises me on investments.
Vehicle insurance expired! Renew now at 70% discount. Pay Rs 1500 to vehicle.insurance@ybl. Call 9665544332
Insurance expired? But I don't have any vehicle now...
Health insurance sir, not vehicle. Your LIC health policy lapsed.
Health insurance... Let me check my papers. I think my son handles this.
Badhai ho! Aapne 1 crore ki lottery jeeti hai! ₹25,000 tax bhejiye lucky.winner@paytm pe. Call: 9876512340
1 crore? Sach mein? Maine toh koi ticket nahi liya tha!
Mobile number se lucky draw tha sir. Tax bhejo aur paisa le lo.
Itna paisa... Pehle main apne bade bete ko call karta hoon. Woh advocate hai.
Due to bank merger, update your account details immediately. Visit sbi-merge-update.in or account will be frozen.
Bank merger? I didn't receive any letter from bank about this...
SMS notification only sir. Update within 24 hours.
Let me go to bank branch tomorrow and ask. This is confusing.
BWSSB: Water connection will be disconnected today evening. Pay Rs 2500 pending bill to bwssb.payment@okaxis immediately.
Water bill? But I pay through the BESCOM office every month...
BWSSB is different sir. This is water board, not electricity.
Oh different? Let me find the bill. My daughter keeps all the bills in the cupboard.
Prime plot in Whitefield 2400 sqft only Rs 25 lakh! Token amount Rs 50,000 to property.deal@ybl. Call 9123456780
Whitefield plot? That area is very expensive! How so cheap?
Owner going abroad urgently. That's why distress sale. Few hours only.
I need to see the property first and check papers. Can I come with my lawyer?
Your NRI son sent $5000 but RBI clearance required. Pay Rs 10,000 processing to forex.service@okhdfc
My son sent money? But he didn't tell me... Let me call him.
Surprise gift sir. Don't call, it will spoil surprise. Pay quickly.
Surprise or not, I will definitely call my son first. He should know about RBI clearance.
PM scholarship Rs 1.5 lakh approved for your grandchild. Pay Rs 3000 registration to eduscholar@okaxis. Call 8765432109
Scholarship? But my grandchildren are still in school... Which one is approved?
For higher education reserve sir. Government scheme for senior citizens' family.
Hmm... I will discuss with my son. He knows about all these government schemes.
Marriage hall booking: Palace Grounds available Jan 2027. Only Rs 25,000 advance. Pay to wedding.venue@ybl or call 7654321098
Wedding hall? But nobody in my family is getting married soon...
Book now for future sir. Price will increase later.
No no, first let my children find someone to marry! Then we will think about hall.
Aapka bank account kal se block ho jayega. Abhi update karo. ₹500 fees bank.update@okicici pe bhejo
Block? Kyun block hoga? Maine sab documents diye the bank mein...
New RBI rule hai sir. Sab accounts verify ho rahe hain.
RBI rule? Toh bank se letter aana chahiye na? Maine koi letter nahi dekha.
Tanishq gold scheme: 10gm gold at Rs 40,000! Limited offer. Pay to gold.invest@ybl. Call 6543210987
10gm gold at 40,000? That is less than market rate! Is Tanishq really offering this?
Special festival offer sir. Only for selected customers like you.
Tanishq shop is in mall near my house. Let me go there and ask about this offer.
Your passport expired. Renew urgently or NRI benefits will stop. Pay Rs 5000 to passport.urgent@okhdfc
Passport? I haven't traveled abroad in 20 years! I don't think I have passport anymore.
As per records sir, renewal is mandatory. Government new rule.
No need passport for me at this age. I am happy in India only.
IRCTC: Your train refund Rs 2,500 pending. Pay Rs 200 processing to irctc.refund@ybl. Call 5432109876
Train refund? I haven't booked any train ticket... I always travel by bus.
Old booking sir from 2023. Cancelled due to train cancellation.
2023? I don't remember... Let me ask my family if anyone booked in my name.
Free recharge Rs 599! Unlimited data 1 year. Pay Rs 99 activation to recharge.offer@paytm
Free recharge? But 599 recharge for only 99? That doesn't make sense...
Promotional offer sir. Jio and Airtel partnership.
My grandson does my recharge. I will ask him to check this offer.
Tata Sky: Your DTH will be disconnected tonight. Pay Rs 999 annual pack to tatasky.renew@okaxis. Call 4321098765
Tata Sky disconnected? But I renewed just 2 months ago!
Plan expired sir. New regulation requires annual payment.
I pay monthly through my bank... Something is wrong. I will call Tata Sky helpline.
CRED: Redeem 50,000 coins worth Rs 5000! Pay Rs 500 processing to cred.cashback@ybl within 1 hour.
CRED? What is CRED? I don't have any coins...
From your credit card payments sir. Points accumulated over years.
I don't use credit card beta. Only debit card for pension withdrawal.
PhonePe: You won Rs 10,000 in scratch card! Claim now. Send Rs 100 to phonepe.reward@paytm to verify account.
PhonePe... I have it but my grandson installed it. I don't know how to use properly.
We will guide you sir. Just send Rs 100 and money will come directly.
Let me call my grandson. He comes every Sunday. He will help me check this.
PM Kisan: Rs 12,000 subsidy approved for you. Pay Rs 1000 verification to pmkisan.fund@okicici. Call 3210987654
PM Kisan? But I am not a farmer... I was government employee.
New scheme for all citizens sir. Modi ji's gift.
Modi ji's scheme should come through proper channel na? Not through SMS like this.
Ayushman Bharat: Your free health card Rs 5 lakh coverage ready. Pay Rs 500 to ayushman.card@ybl for delivery.
Free health card? Sounds good but why pay for free card?
Courier charges and lamination sir. Government doesn't cover these.
Government health camp comes to our area. I will ask them about this card.
Urgent! Aapke account se ₹50,000 transfer ho raha hai! OTP batao turant cancel karne ke liye!
₹50,000 transfer? Kisne kiya? Maine toh nahi kiya kuch bhi!
Hackers ne kiya sir! Jaldi OTP do warna paisa chala jayega!
Ruko ruko... Main bank jaata hoon abhi. Woh log hi dekh lenge.
